author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Needs some compat entries, at least on Julia itself.
Usually package names are uppercase, perhaps `ParticleMDI`?
That would be much more idiomatic for the Julia ecosystem. Note also that the name of the module in the package and the corresponding file names will need to have matching case in order to work.

body:
- Registering package: particleMDI
- Repository: https://github.com/nathancunn/particleMDI.jl
- Created by: @nathancunn
- Version: v0.1.0
- Commit: 07fb8dae5a0a7fb8751753ae04606bb7a7e2a49c
- Reviewed by: @nathancunn
- Reference: https://github.com/nathancunn/particleMDI.jl/issues/1

title: New package: particleMDI v0.1.0
